channel.title: Exeing GK before d3
channel.description:
Hey all, I have no problem with most of the other classes, but King needs a rework. Maybe change the spawn rate again, but dont tell anyone what it is this time. My most recent 20 games Ive had have had this happen in 10 of the games - Instant King hanging on d2 or 3 with reason being : 40% EK. That is WAY to high of a kill rate for exeing kings that soon with no proof.
There needs to be a FAR higher penalty in the first 3 days for exeing a good King.
My thoughts are to add the penalties of Exeing a fool to the King if hes Good after the first 3 days. Before the first 3 days, add the Hunter penalty + Fool penalty to the GK.
Example abils could be -
Captain of the Guard - During the first 3 days, the Captain of the Kings guard will kill the first person to vote guilty on a good king if the king is executed.
Traitor to the King - Any BD executing a GK is issued a betrayal warning from the court, reducing ALL of their activatable abilities by 1. This also applies to new Kings.
Im not sure if this is the best way to solve this, Just throwing out a possible solution. The main problem is the insta-vote of kings before d3 just on the off chance that they *could* be evil. The penalty right now just isnt enough to stop the vote up.
